content.rendered:
One of the biggest fears you’ll face as an Amazon seller is account suspension. CJ Rosenbaum specializes in the very thing. He’s been on the show to offer advice on how to avoid suspension, and what you need to do if you’re facing suspension.

He also has a brand new book, Your Guide to Amazon Suspension: 2017-2018 Edition. He priced it as low as his publisher would let him, even making the images black and white to lower the cost some more. You can get a copy on Amazon for $6.20. However, CJ has offered to give the book away to Amazing FBA listeners so be sure to sign up below to get your copy.

Interviews

222 Intellectual Property Protection for Amazon Sellers them with Rob Segall of Amazon Sellers Lawyer
On the show today, we will be returning to the legal side of Amazon. We have Rob Segall and Travis Stockman from AmazonSellersLawyer to talk about intellectual property protection.

218 Amazon account Suspended? What to do – with CJ Rosenbaum part 2
CJ talks to us about different reasons Amazon may suspend your account and how to avoid that.

217 Amazon Suspension Risks with CJ Rosenbaum Part 1
Today we’ll be talking, once again, to CJ Rosenbaum of AmazonSellersLawyer.com about Amazon suspension risks and how to avoid them.

162 Amazon Law Q & A with CJ Rosenbaum
We have CJ Rosenbaum with us to do answer some listen submitted answers. I recently sent out a newsletter requesting the listeners to submit their Amazon questions.

158 Amazon Legal Issues with CJ Rosenbaum Part 2 of 3
A lot of us sellers do while label existing products. It’s important that you don’t inadvertently break IP laws and get into Amazon legal issues.

157 Amazon Account Suspension with CJ Rosenbaum Part 1 of 3
I am always getting legal questions when it comes to selling on Amazon. We have with us CJ Rosenbaum, the founder of Amazon Sellers Lawyer, to help answer some questions about Amazon account suspension.
